tags: what a time to be alive
summary: It’s really hard to stan just one person in BTS cuz like they are so wholesome. Like yeah it’s great they’re a good looking...
body: It’s really hard to stan just one person in BTS cuz like they are so wholesome. Like yeah it’s great they’re a good looking group but nobody can ever come close to being as precious and important as jhope, taehyung gives all weirdoes a sense and of pride, jimin works so hard his good looks are just icing on the cake, jungkook is so multitalented it’s hard to forgive him until you see him stare and react to their MVs, RM is so upfront about his shortcomings it makes you forget he’s not the oldest, jin is just such a good big brother and he looks after everyone, yoongi works so hard and raps so good and is so cute and he hates people but puts up with us like how can you not love all of them.

recent— silent black keys

i write sometimes;

summary:
hyung line 「you are scared of the camera flash」
here you go anonie🤧💞 
Also, congratulation to BTS for taking home those trophies...
body:
hyung line 「you are scared of the camera flash」

  • here you go anonie🤧💞
  • Also, congratulation to BTS for taking home those trophies yesterday🏆🏆🏆
  • been a long time but i love you all🐨💓

Seokjin

The relationship was new although Jin and you have known each other for such a long time. There’s still so much thing to learn, both for you and for him about each other. He has an award show coming this Saturday and he wanted you to come with him. You do not think much about it because ever since he made the relationship public, you have yet to encounter a very negative comment. You immediately ended up agreeing.

The boys were walking down the red carpet while Jin was holding your hand to walk along with him. It hasn’t hit you at first because the people who were standing near the entrance have been told to not use flash camera. But as you walked further down and as the sound of the professional camera’s shutter became clearer, you knew you made a mistake for not thinking twice.

The boys stopped at the open area and numerous people from the media took their pictures. Poses after poses, the shouting of the fans, and the light from the camera, together with the warm weather, starting to get the best of you. You held Seokjin’s hand tighter to make sure that he doesnot let go of you. Seokjin who realized your sudden action, felt a sudden surge of worry.

“You okay?” he whispered in your ears.

“I’m not, Jinnie. I couldn’t- the light, it’s-“ to the fans, this might be a cute gesture. But Seokjin knew you were feeling worse than what you looked like because he could see you in the brink of tears.

“Hold my hand, okay, y/n,” and you give him a small nod. Seokjin felt your body growing heavier on him. He knew it took all your strength just to stand by now. When the boys were instructed to enter the venue, Seokjin blew out the breath he didn’t know he has been holding.

Right after you are out of reach of the camera, you started crying. You make sure no one heard it, and let out no voice. You just need to because you’ve been holding it. Jin instructed the boys to sit first and signaled them that he’s going later. He hugged you until your body stopped shaking and your knees were strong enough to stand again.

“I’m sorry, love,” he said, lips kissing the top of your head. “If I knew you hated that I could-“

“It’s okay. I also didn’t think about it either. It’s neither on me or you.” you smiled to him.

“I’ll make sure you are okay next time. I’m sorry. I’m sorry.”

“It’s okay. It’s okay.”

Seokjin left a short kiss on your lips before holding you even tighter than before and entered the venue, ready to conquer the night.

Yoongi

Yoongi was not there when it happened. The moment you stepped out of the car, the media started to crowd around the boys, seperating you from Yoongi.

Yoongi told you that there’s a big award show coming the day after tomorrow and he wanted you to attend it with him. He knew you will most probably reject him right away but you succumbed to his sweater paws and pout. But he doesn’t know there’s also another reason to why you will reject him.

Before the show, you kept on regulating your breath, breathing in and out to make yourself calm; telling yourself it is just flashes from camera. What you didn’t expect, however, is being seperated right after you stepped out of the car.

Flashes were coming from all directions and there are some fans who kept on shouting your name. You tried to avoid the camera and went straight in, passing the boys who are still being interviewed; hoping that you’ll get through it to the venue. Yoongi’s eyes were on you the whole time, hating that you were seperated from him.

But when an interviewer came in front of you and started to throw you questions, you could just hope that your body doesn’t shake that much on the camera. When they finally let you go, you ran to the venue and quickly went in BTS’ dressing room.

“Y/n, are you okay, do you need anything?” one of the staff approached you and you shook your head. He went away, knowing that you need some time alone, after you thanked him.

You heard someone opening the dressing room’s door abruptly. Yoongi’s eyes search for you. When he saw you sitting in front of the mirror, looking at your reflection blankly, he knew he shouldn’t have brought you here; but why?

“Y/n?” he called gently and you turned around to face him.

“I- why are you here. I’m so sorry, I should have insisted you coming with us.”

“It’s not your fault, Yoongi. It’s just- it’s just the flash from the camera. I hated them and there’s- there are- so many of- them just now,” your voice started shaking. You didn’t want to cry now. Yoongi probably think it as something stupid.

“I’m sorry it’s such a stupid thing,” you chuckled while wiping of the tears with your hand. Yoongi turned the chair and were now on your sitting level. He brought you to a hug, while you continue crying.

“It is not stupid. You hated it, if you hate it, it’s not stupid. I’m sorry, love, I should- I should have been there,” you could sense how guilty yoongi is from his tone.

“You should go. I’ll stay until I calm down and I’ll join you.”

“I’ll stay.”

“You should be out there with the boys, Yoongs.”

“The boys are okay waiting out there for me. You are not. I am staying with you until you’ve calmed down and we’ll go together.” his thumb caressing your hand trying to soothe you. “You need a touch on your make-up again, anyway.” You both laughed at how Yoongi can break the heavy atmosphere and still made you laughed even when you felt like a complete failure.

“Thank you, Yoongs.”

“It’s okay, love. It’s okay.”

Hoseok

You have made your relationship public for a long time, but this was actually the first time where Hoseok and you will be in front of the public formally. You have told him that you didn’t want to walk the red carped with him because you didn’t want your presence to disturb them. Although hobi had insisted that you don’t, you still managed to slip away.

BTS were scheduled to perform next, when you started to hear camera shutters. You thought everything will be alright but when the sudden flash came in contact with your eyes, you thought everything went black for a moment. You couldn’t take off your eyes, off the flashing camera even though you tried to.

With your shaking body, you excused yourself to the restroom, not coming out until Hoseok found you. You have never told him you were afraid of camera flash, it is nonsense for an adult to be afraid of such thing. But you couldn’t help yourself but felt anxious whenever someone uses the flash from their camera.

BTS performed well, that’s what you thought, and they did. You could hear Idol, then fake love, then I’m Fine playing from outside the restroom. You were glad that no one knocked on yur door while you’re in there.

The boys went back to their seats and Jungkook told Hoseok that you were no where to be found. Hoseok thought that you went to the batroom, but when you haven’t come back after 15 minutes, he made his way there.

The first knock on the door. You didn’t anwer, thinking that it might be some random people. The second knock came with a very familiar voice, calling your name, “y/n, are you in there?”

You didn’t want to answer him because you know your voice will sound terrible. After the forth knock when you thought Hoseok stopped trying, you phone rings instead. He was calling you.

“Open the door, y/n. I know you’re in there.” You stood up and unlocked the door for him. Hoseok opened the door, slowly revealing your pathetic form.

“What- what happened, love?” his heart dropped when he saw tear trails on your cheek. Eyes red from crying.

“I miss your stage, Hobi. I’m sorry.” You started to cry again when you realized you really have just missed out your boyfriend live stage.

“It’s okay, y/n. Sho sho, hey, princess, tell me what happened? Did anyone hurt you? Do you feel pain anywhere?”

“No. It’s-it’s just someone took a picture on me just now and the sudden light from the camera, I just don’t really- I don’t really like it.”

Hoseok was shocked at your statement. He never knew you hated camera flash, this is also the reason why you have declined his invitation to walk the red carpet with him.

“Hey, it’s okay now. It’s okay now, I’m here.”

“I am sorry I missed your performance, I should have stayed.”

“Do not blame yourself. You didn’t do it on purpose, you hear me?” Hoseok was smiling, he was still that sunshine you know. His sole presence calmed you almost immediately.

“Now, let’s see that smile on your face. That’s it.” You stayed in the bathroom for a while before Hoseok lead you out of it, while walking back, you could hear him, whispering to you, “Please tell me if you are scared of something, y/n. I didn’t want you to feel like that again.”

Namjoon

Namjoon knew you dislike taking picture, but he doesn’t know that you hated the flash that might come together with the camera. When Namjoon told you that he wanted you to walk down the red carpet with him for the upcoming award show, you almost choked yourself with the chicken wings you’re eating.

You didn’t want to reject him, but you couldn’t imagine walking down that red carpet with numerous camera taking photos of you with flash. But because Namjoon said please do it for him, you agree to it.

You were holding Namjoon’s hand the whole time, trying to smile to the media and the fans. You kept that smile on your lips, trying to answer all the question asked to you.

BTS were performing first, so instead of heading to their seats, they went to the dressing room. The moment you were inside, you remembered all the flashes and the sound of camera’s shutters, and again the flashes. Your breath became shorter and the chill room became warm. The next thing you remembered is Namjoon calling your name before everything turns black.

When you were awake, only the staff were there. They told you that you passed out earlier and the boys are now performing.

“You want water, y/n?” One of the staff offered you water. “Yes, please.”

“Their stage will end soon, so, don’t worry, Namjoon will be here.” And he was right. Namjoon came rushing in the dressing room with heavy breath and sweat. You could see how he’s still trying to catch his breath while heaving a sigh of relieve to your conscious figure.

“You made me worry sick,” he said, holding both of your hand instead of hugging you.

“I’m sorry.”

“Why didn’t you tell me you didn’t feel well? You could just rest at home.” he said, sounded almost like he’s angry.

“I am not sick, Joonie. I am okay when I left home—“

“Then why don’t you tell me you’re not okay when we were in the car?”

“I’m not okay when we were interviewed, Joon. I- I didn’t hate the camera or taking pictures, I hated the flash that comes with it. Whenever I see them, my vision went blury.”

“You should have told me, y/n.”

“I’m sorry. I just feel like you don’t need to know this. It’s not important anyway.”

“Not important? You passing out today because of thag is not important?” Namjoon let out a sigh, he didn’t mean to raise his voice, it just came out naturally because he was so worried.

“I am worried sick, y/n. I- I just, let’s talk about it later, okay?” you nodded your head.

Namjoon is still holding onto your hand. “You feel better now, do you want to go home?” You shook your head. “I want to stay,” Namjoon smiled to your answer.

“I’m sorry I raised my voice, y/n.”

“It’s okay. I know what you mean.”

“We’ll talk about it once we’re home okay? Under the blankets with RM and cuddles. Promise me you’ll tell me everything you hated or dislike.”

With your shaking body, you excused yourself to the restroom, not coming out until Hoseok found you. You have never told him you were afraid of camera flash, it is nonsense for an adult to be afraid of such thing. But you couldn’t help yourself but felt anxious whenever someone uses the flash from their camera.

BTS performed well, that’s what you thought, and they did. You could hear Idol, then fake love, then I’m Fine playing from outside the restroom. You were glad that no one knocked on yur door while you’re in there.

The boys went back to their seats and Jungkook told Hoseok that you were no where to be found. Hoseok thought that you went to the batroom, but when you haven’t come back after 15 minutes, he made his way there.

The first knock on the door. You didn’t anwer, thinking that it might be some random people. The second knock came with a very familiar voice, calling your name, “y/n, are you in there?”

You didn’t want to answer him because you know your voice will sound terrible. After the forth knock when you thought Hoseok stopped trying, you phone rings instead. He was calling you.

“Open the door, y/n. I know you’re in there.” You stood up and unlocked the door for him. Hoseok opened the door, slowly revealing your pathetic form.

“What- what happened, love?” his heart dropped when he saw tear trails on your cheek. Eyes red from crying.

“I miss your stage, Hobi. I’m sorry.” You started to cry again when you realized you really have just missed out your boyfriend live stage.

“It’s okay, y/n. Sho sho, hey, princess, tell me what happened? Did anyone hurt you? Do you feel pain anywhere?”

“No. It’s-it’s just someone took a picture on me just now and the sudden light from the camera, I just don’t really- I don’t really like it.”

Hoseok was shocked at your statement. He never knew you hated camera flash, this is also the reason why you have declined his invitation to walk the red carpet with him.

“Hey, it’s okay now. It’s okay now, I’m here.”

“I am sorry I missed your performance, I should have stayed.”

“Do not blame yourself. You didn’t do it on purpose, you hear me?” Hoseok was smiling, he was still that sunshine you know. His sole presence calmed you almost immediately.

“Now, let’s see that smile on your face. That’s it.” You stayed in the bathroom for a while before Hoseok lead you out of it, while walking back, you could hear him, whispering to you, “Please tell me if you are scared of something, y/n. I didn’t want you to feel like that again.”

Namjoon

Namjoon knew you dislike taking picture, but he doesn’t know that you hated the flash that might come together with the camera. When Namjoon told you that he wanted you to walk down the red carpet with him for the upcoming award show, you almost choked yourself with the chicken wings you’re eating.

You didn’t want to reject him, but you couldn’t imagine walking down that red carpet with numerous camera taking photos of you with flash. But because Namjoon said please do it for him, you agree to it.

You were holding Namjoon’s hand the whole time, trying to smile to the media and the fans. You kept that smile on your lips, trying to answer all the question asked to you.

BTS were performing first, so instead of heading to their seats, they went to the dressing room. The moment you were inside, you remembered all the flashes and the sound of camera’s shutters, and again the flashes. Your breath became shorter and the chill room became warm. The next thing you remembered is Namjoon calling your name before everything turns black.

When you were awake, only the staff were there. They told you that you passed out earlier and the boys are now performing.

“You want water, y/n?” One of the staff offered you water. “Yes, please.”

“Their stage will end soon, so, don’t worry, Namjoon will be here.” And he was right. Namjoon came rushing in the dressing room with heavy breath and sweat. You could see how he’s still trying to catch his breath while heaving a sigh of relieve to your conscious figure.

“You made me worry sick,” he said, holding both of your hand instead of hugging you.

“I’m sorry.”

“Why didn’t you tell me you didn’t feel well? You could just rest at home.” he said, sounded almost like he’s angry.

“I am not sick, Joonie. I am okay when I left home—“

“Then why don’t you tell me you’re not okay when we were in the car?”

“I’m not okay when we were interviewed, Joon. I- I didn’t hate the camera or taking pictures, I hated the flash that comes with it. Whenever I see them, my vision went blury.”

“You should have told me, y/n.”

“I’m sorry. I just feel like you don’t need to know this. It’s not important anyway.”

“Not important? You passing out today because of thag is not important?” Namjoon let out a sigh, he didn’t mean to raise his voice, it just came out naturally because he was so worried.

“I am worried sick, y/n. I- I just, let’s talk about it later, okay?” you nodded your head.

Namjoon is still holding onto your hand. “You feel better now, do you want to go home?” You shook your head. “I want to stay,” Namjoon smiled to your answer.

“I’m sorry I raised my voice, y/n.”

“It’s okay. I know what you mean.”

“We’ll talk about it once we’re home okay? Under the blankets with RM and cuddles. Promise me you’ll tell me everything you hated or dislike.”

trail.content_raw:
hyung line 「you are scared of the camera flash」

  • here you go anonie🤧💞
  • Also, congratulation to BTS for taking home those trophies yesterday🏆🏆🏆
  • been a long time but i love you all🐨💓

Seokjin

The relationship was new although Jin and you have known each other for such a long time. There’s still so much thing to learn, both for you and for him about each other. He has an award show coming this Saturday and he wanted you to come with him. You do not think much about it because ever since he made the relationship public, you have yet to encounter a very negative comment. You immediately ended up agreeing.

The boys were walking down the red carpet while Jin was holding your hand to walk along with him. It hasn’t hit you at first because the people who were standing near the entrance have been told to not use flash camera. But as you walked further down and as the sound of the professional camera’s shutter became clearer, you knew you made a mistake for not thinking twice.

The boys stopped at the open area and numerous people from the media took their pictures. Poses after poses, the shouting of the fans, and the light from the camera, together with the warm weather, starting to get the best of you. You held Seokjin’s hand tighter to make sure that he doesnot let go of you. Seokjin who realized your sudden action, felt a sudden surge of worry.

“You okay?” he whispered in your ears.

“I’m not, Jinnie. I couldn’t- the light, it’s-“ to the fans, this might be a cute gesture. But Seokjin knew you were feeling worse than what you looked like because he could see you in the brink of tears.

“Hold my hand, okay, y/n,” and you give him a small nod. Seokjin felt your body growing heavier on him. He knew it took all your strength just to stand by now. When the boys were instructed to enter the venue, Seokjin blew out the breath he didn’t know he has been holding.

Right after you are out of reach of the camera, you started crying. You make sure no one heard it, and let out no voice. You just need to because you’ve been holding it. Jin instructed the boys to sit first and signaled them that he’s going later. He hugged you until your body stopped shaking and your knees were strong enough to stand again.

“I’m sorry, love,” he said, lips kissing the top of your head. “If I knew you hated that I could-“

“It’s okay. I also didn’t think about it either. It’s neither on me or you.” you smiled to him.

“I’ll make sure you are okay next time. I’m sorry. I’m sorry.”

“It’s okay. It’s okay.”

Seokjin left a short kiss on your lips before holding you even tighter than before and entered the venue, ready to conquer the night.

Yoongi

Yoongi was not there when it happened. The moment you stepped out of the car, the media started to crowd around the boys, seperating you from Yoongi.

Yoongi told you that there’s a big award show coming the day after tomorrow and he wanted you to attend it with him. He knew you will most probably reject him right away but you succumbed to his sweater paws and pout. But he doesn’t know there’s also another reason to why you will reject him.

Before the show, you kept on regulating your breath, breathing in and out to make yourself calm; telling yourself it is just flashes from camera. What you didn’t expect, however, is being seperated right after you stepped out of the car.

Flashes were coming from all directions and there are some fans who kept on shouting your name. You tried to avoid the camera and went straight in, passing the boys who are still being interviewed; hoping that you’ll get through it to the venue. Yoongi’s eyes were on you the whole time, hating that you were seperated from him.

But when an interviewer came in front of you and started to throw you questions, you could just hope that your body doesn’t shake that much on the camera. When they finally let you go, you ran to the venue and quickly went in BTS’ dressing room.

“Y/n, are you okay, do you need anything?” one of the staff approached you and you shook your head. He went away, knowing that you need some time alone, after you thanked him.

You heard someone opening the dressing room’s door abruptly. Yoongi’s eyes search for you. When he saw you sitting in front of the mirror, looking at your reflection blankly, he knew he shouldn’t have brought you here; but why?

“Y/n?” he called gently and you turned around to face him.

“I- why are you here. I’m so sorry, I should have insisted you coming with us.”

“It’s not your fault, Yoongi. It’s just- it’s just the flash from the camera. I hated them and there’s- there are- so many of- them just now,” your voice started shaking. You didn’t want to cry now. Yoongi probably think it as something stupid.

“I’m sorry it’s such a stupid thing,” you chuckled while wiping of the tears with your hand. Yoongi turned the chair and were now on your sitting level. He brought you to a hug, while you continue crying.

“It is not stupid. You hated it, if you hate it, it’s not stupid. I’m sorry, love, I should- I should have been there,” you could sense how guilty yoongi is from his tone.

“You should go. I’ll stay until I calm down and I’ll join you.”

“I’ll stay.”

“You should be out there with the boys, Yoongs.”

“The boys are okay waiting out there for me. You are not. I am staying with you until you’ve calmed down and we’ll go together.” his thumb caressing your hand trying to soothe you. “You need a touch on your make-up again, anyway.” You both laughed at how Yoongi can break the heavy atmosphere and still made you laughed even when you felt like a complete failure.

“Thank you, Yoongs.”

“It’s okay, love. It’s okay.”

Hoseok

You have made your relationship public for a long time, but this was actually the first time where Hoseok and you will be in front of the public formally. You have told him that you didn’t want to walk the red carped with him because you didn’t want your presence to disturb them. Although hobi had insisted that you don’t, you still managed to slip away.

BTS were scheduled to perform next, when you started to hear camera shutters. You thought everything will be alright but when the sudden flash came in contact with your eyes, you thought everything went black for a moment. You couldn’t take off your eyes, off the flashing camera even though you tried to.

With your shaking body, you excused yourself to the restroom, not coming out until Hoseok found you. You have never told him you were afraid of camera flash, it is nonsense for an adult to be afraid of such thing. But you couldn’t help yourself but felt anxious whenever someone uses the flash from their camera.

BTS performed well, that’s what you thought, and they did. You could hear Idol, then fake love, then I’m Fine playing from outside the restroom. You were glad that no one knocked on yur door while you’re in there.

“Open the door, y/n. I know you’re in there.” You stood up and unlocked the door for him. Hoseok opened the door, slowly revealing your pathetic form.

“What- what happened, love?” his heart dropped when he saw tear trails on your cheek. Eyes red from crying.

“I miss your stage, Hobi. I’m sorry.” You started to cry again when you realized you really have just missed out your boyfriend live stage.

“It’s okay, y/n. Sho sho, hey, princess, tell me what happened? Did anyone hurt you? Do you feel pain anywhere?”

“No. It’s-it’s just someone took a picture on me just now and the sudden light from the camera, I just don’t really- I don’t really like it.”

Hoseok was shocked at your statement. He never knew you hated camera flash, this is also the reason why you have declined his invitation to walk the red carpet with him.

“Hey, it’s okay now. It’s okay now, I’m here.”

“I am sorry I missed your performance, I should have stayed.”

“Do not blame yourself. You didn’t do it on purpose, you hear me?” Hoseok was smiling, he was still that sunshine you know. His sole presence calmed you almost immediately.

“Now, let’s see that smile on your face. That’s it.” You stayed in the bathroom for a while before Hoseok lead you out of it, while walking back, you could hear him, whispering to you, “Please tell me if you are scared of something, y/n. I didn’t want you to feel like that again.”

Namjoon

Namjoon knew you dislike taking picture, but he doesn’t know that you hated the flash that might come together with the camera. When Namjoon told you that he wanted you to walk down the red carpet with him for the upcoming award show, you almost choked yourself with the chicken wings you’re eating.

You didn’t want to reject him, but you couldn’t imagine walking down that red carpet with numerous camera taking photos of you with flash. But because Namjoon said please do it for him, you agree to it.

You were holding Namjoon’s hand the whole time, trying to smile to the media and the fans. You kept that smile on your lips, trying to answer all the question asked to you.

BTS were performing first, so instead of heading to their seats, they went to the dressing room. The moment you were inside, you remembered all the flashes and the sound of camera’s shutters, and again the flashes. Your breath became shorter and the chill room became warm. The next thing you remembered is Namjoon calling your name before everything turns black.

When you were awake, only the staff were there. They told you that you passed out earlier and the boys are now performing.

“You want water, y/n?” One of the staff offered you water. “Yes, please.”

“Their stage will end soon, so, don’t worry, Namjoon will be here.” And he was right. Namjoon came rushing in the dressing room with heavy breath and sweat. You could see how he’s still trying to catch his breath while heaving a sigh of relieve to your conscious figure.

“You made me worry sick,” he said, holding both of your hand instead of hugging you.

“I’m sorry.”

“Why didn’t you tell me you didn’t feel well? You could just rest at home.” he said, sounded almost like he’s angry.

“I am not sick, Joonie. I am okay when I left home—“

“Then why don’t you tell me you’re not okay when we were in the car?”

“I’m not okay when we were interviewed, Joon. I- I didn’t hate the camera or taking pictures, I hated the flash that comes with it. Whenever I see them, my vision went blury.”

“You should have told me, y/n.”

“I’m sorry. I just feel like you don’t need to know this. It’s not important anyway.”

“Not important? You passing out today because of thag is not important?” Namjoon let out a sigh, he didn’t mean to raise his voice, it just came out naturally because he was so worried.

“I am worried sick, y/n. I- I just, let’s talk about it later, okay?” you nodded your head.

Namjoon is still holding onto your hand. “You feel better now, do you want to go home?” You shook your head. “I want to stay,” Namjoon smiled to your answer.

“I’m sorry I raised my voice, y/n.”

“It’s okay. I know what you mean.”

“We’ll talk about it once we’re home okay? Under the blankets with RM and cuddles. Promise me you’ll tell me everything you hated or dislike.”

blog.name: ao3feednamjin
blog.title: *winkwonk*
blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Kim Namjoon | RM/Kim Seokjin | Jin tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

title: Welcome to Fairyland
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2qGB8kR

by Aleksandra97

“Taetae, are those sparkles around you? Or am I dreaming?”

“Kookie, I’m sorry to say this but I think it’s that sketchy gas station pizza making you see things”

“No, you always kinda glow, Tae, but this is plus ultra glow. You look so pre…”

The sentiment is interrupted by violent vomiting that overtakes Jungkook and ends up on Taehyung’s shoes. He knew he should not have taken any members of BTS with him on this trip. Now, his heart breaks in half looking at the biggest love and loss of his life, wilting away in front of him, and he, unable to rescue or assist. A single tear slides down Taehyung’s face when he finally says goodbye to his true soulmate - his Gucci slippers with the golden thread and special embroidery from the 2017 edition. Damn it all!

Or the one where Taehyung is a fairy, unbeknownst to the rest of Bangtan, and tries to sneak out to travel to the tree of destiny, gets caught by Jungkook, who gets caught by the rest of BTS and now they are all crammed in the back of a bus with Tae wondering why in the hell did he not use his invisibility spell.

Words: 535, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 방탄소년단 | Bangtan Boys | BTS
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M

by Aleksandra97

“Taetae, are those sparkles around you? Or am I dreaming?”

“Kookie, I’m sorry to say this but I think it’s that sketchy gas station pizza making you see things”

“No, you always kinda glow, Tae, but this is plus ultra glow. You look so pre…”

The sentiment is interrupted by violent vomiting that overtakes Jungkook and ends up on Taehyung’s shoes. He knew he should not have taken any members of BTS with him on this trip. Now, his heart breaks in half looking at the biggest love and loss of his life, wilting away in front of him, and he, unable to rescue or assist. A single tear slides down Taehyung’s face when he finally says goodbye to his true soulmate - his Gucci slippers with the golden thread and special embroidery from the 2017 edition. Damn it all!

Or the one where Taehyung is a fairy, unbeknownst to the rest of Bangtan, and tries to sneak out to travel to the tree of destiny, gets caught by Jungkook, who gets caught by the rest of BTS and now they are all crammed in the back of a bus with Tae wondering why in the hell did he not use his invisibility spell.

Words: 535, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English
